PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Alright, let's get into leveling!
Shadow Start - No Need to Mule ANYTHING
Enter town -> Nessa -> Look for LINKS -> No gems to Buy
Priority: BBG x2 (need ONE early but 2nd later) - BBB (for act 3 onwards) - BG - BB
Tarkleigh -> Stormblast Mines -> Links -> Same -> type "nn" and look for Movement Speed
---After Hailrake---
Nessa -> Frostbomb + Onslaught + Arcane Surge (in order of importance)
Look for links if you don't have BBG yet.
Links come BEFORE Arcane Surge
Tarkleigh -> Frostblink + Orb of Storms
Look for Links if you don't have BBG -> type "nn" for movement speed
---Lower Prison---
Nessa -> Added Lightning Damage -> Links if Needed
Tarkleigh -> check for Movement Speed
---After Brutus---
Nessa -> Buy Smoke Mine
Tarkleigh -> Grab Flame Dash -> check for MS (movement speed)
---After Merveil---
Nothing
---After Chamber of Sins---
Greust -> Grab Skitterbots/Herald of Thunder
Yeena -> buy Skitterbots/Herald of Thunder
---After Weaver---
Silk -> Elemental Focus
Yeena -> Controlled Destruction
---After General Gravicious---
Clarissa -> Blade Blast
---After Malachai---
Dialla - Unleash
LINKS YOU WILL BE USING
Act 1: Frostbomb - Onslaught (BG) Orb of Storms (B) Stormblast Mine - Swift Assembly - Added Lightning Damage (BBG) *** THIS IS PRIORITY 3L FOR DEALING DAMAGE*** Frostblink - Arcane Surge -> Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Smoke Mine (G)
Act 2: Frostbomb - Onslaught (BG) Stormblast Mine - Swift Assembly - Added Lightning Damage (BBG) Orb of Storms (B) Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Smoke Mine (G) Skitterbots (B) Herald of Thunder (B)
*** VERY IMPORTANT TO DO WAND CRAFT BEFORE THE ACT 2 BOSS - YOU NEED TO BE MINIMUM LVL 20 ***
Any Vendor: 1 Orb of Alteration 1 Magic Wand 1 RARE TOPAZ RING ******************************************
Act 3: Orb of Storms - Onslaught - Controlled Destruction (BBG) Stormblast Mines - Added Lightning Damage - Elemental Focus (BBB) Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Skitterbots (B) Herald of Thunder (B) Smoke Mine (G)
*** SWAP TO BF/BB *** (After General Gravicious)
Blade Fall (Act 2) - Faster Casting (Act 2) - Spell Cascade (Act 1) (BBG) Blade Blast (Reward) - Physical to Lightning (Act 2) - Controlled Destruction - Elemental Focus (BBBG) Drop Elemental Focus if you only have a 3L Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Skitterbots (B) Herald of Ash (Act 2) (R) Smoke Mine (G)
Act 4: Blade Fall - Unleash - Spell Cascade (BBG) Blade Blast - Physical to Lightning - Controlled Destruction - Elemental Focus (BBBG) Drop Elemental Focus if you only have a 3L Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Skitterbots (B) Herald of Ash (Act 2) (R) Smoke Mine (G)
REST OF THE GAME FOR LVLING - IN ORDER OF PRIORITY
Blade Fall - Unleash - Spell Cascade - Faster Casting (BBBG) Blade Blast - Physical to Lightning - Controlled Destruction - Elemental Focus - Intensify - Increased Critical Strikes (if your crit rate feels low, othewise go with Increased Critical Damage early and once you have Power Charges go with Power charge on Crit) Flame Dash - Arcane Surge (BB) Skitterbots (B) Herald of Ash (Act 2) (R) Smoke Mine (G) Cast when Damage Taken - SteelSkin - Increased Duration (RRR)
